attributes.action: Repeal part 2 chapter 2 of the Coroners and Justice Act
attributes.additional_details:
I move for the total Repeal of part 2 chapter 2 of the Coroners and Justice Act 2009
called by some  the “dangerous cartoon act “.  we the undersigned are DO NOT defend the right to possess sexually explicit images of  REAL children.  nobody is harmed in the production of these cartoon images  This law instead impinges on personal and creative freedoms of the individual more so in the culture of anime and manga. And
the Trade in creative media between Japan, America and the U.K
